query:
SELECT tc.*, u.name as user_name, t.name as trip_name 
FROM trip_collaborators tc
LEFT JOIN users u ON tc.userId = u.id
LEFT JOIN trips t ON tc.tripId = t.id
WHERE u.email IN ('mikgrn@gmail.com', 'gorene75@gmail.com')
ORDER BY tc.id;
command:
